resources.string: SOS offers our clients access to appropriate emergency assistance when: (a) you don’t know who to call (b) you don’t know where you are (c) you want to notify your emergency contacts about your emergency and the exact location (d) you want your emergency contacts and the emergency services to navigate directly to your location in an emergency.
I am a 27 year old female from Pretoria. I have been in an abusive relationship forthe past 5 years. My partner used to physically and emotionally abuse me for the last 3 years .
